text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The day of Air Groove's debut finally<n>arrives. Thanks to the
strong<n>reputation she's already earned,<n>she's the clear
favorite to win this<n>race.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: However...

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The frontmost runners are entering<n>the homestretch! And
today's<n>favorite, Air Groove, makes a bid for<n>the lead!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Can she make it? Will she do it? The<n>finish line is within
reach! Will Air<n>Groove take the win?!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
And it's all over! The Empress Air<n>Groove fails to clinch
first by a neck's<n>length!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Despite a fine showing from the<n>Empress, an even fiercer
opponent<n>seizes the victory, leaving her to<n>settle for
second place.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Defeat... Ugh. What a pathetic<n>performance!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
No, I can't let my emotions get the<n>best of me here. My
capabilities as an<n>empress are simply lacking, thus<n>
leading to this failure.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I'd best learn from this<n>disgrace—refine myself until I
become<n>worthy of my name.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Listen up. I'm enacting some<n>changes as your client. I know
we<n>were supposed to have the afternoon<n>off, but we'll be
holding a meeting.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
We need to completely redesign the<n>regimen in order to get
superior<n>results.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Refusing to submit to the bitterness of<n>defeat, Air Groove
makes a firm<n>declaration of intent, determined to<n>maintain
her own regal identity.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As her trainer, I want to support her in<n>those lofty ambitions
somehow. If I<n>can convince her to make a few<n>
adjustments to her busy schedule...

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Hey, are you listening to me? You<n>seem to be off in your
own world.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: You'd better not be thinking of saying<n>anything out of line.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: We established this from the start,correct? You'll be concerned onlywith providing me the most effective training regimen possible.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Or will you breach the terms of our<n>contract, like the others?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I truly am concerned with how busy<n>she finds herself on the
daily. But if<n>I'm not careful, then this relationship<n>will
quickly fall apart.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
That evening, I am truly at a loss as I<n>desperately try to
think of what best to<n>do.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove's Former Trainer
text_block_list.text:
But if she attempts to keep up with<n>student council activities
and tutoring,<n>it will hinder her own growth. So<n>please!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Air Groove has joined the student<n>council with clear
intention and<n>purpose. No one can have her<n>abdicate the
role but herself.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I realize that I have yet to ask her<n>just why she dedicates
so much time<n>to her extracurricular activities.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
If only I could discover a little bit more<n>behind what makes
her tick...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I understand the situation. So that's<n>why you've come to
me. Mhmm.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Indeed, I could probably tell most<n>anything you would want
to know. But<n>that would hardly qualify as grasping<n>her
true intentions.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
If you really wish to be of one mind,<n>don't you think it would
be better to<n>have her reveal these things to you<n>herself?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
That said, I can see that you thought<n>long and hard on her
situation before<n>coming to me. Your sincere devotion<n>is
very clear.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
In deference to that devotion, perhaps<n>I can offer some
guidance. Follow me.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I follow Symboli Rudolf to the training<n>grounds. There, we
find Air Groove<n>assisting Mejiro Dober with a<n>training
session.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
You could work on improving your<n>starting acceleration.
Pitch your heels<n>immediately and try to lead with a<n>longer
stride.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
A longer stride? I've tried stretching<n>my legs farther, but it
always makes<n>me lose precious speed...

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Long strides require you to master a<n>certain rhythm—one
that your body<n>isn't used to yet. I think I can teach<n>you
something helpful.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Try marking the course at<n>one-and-a-half-meter intervals
and<n>aim to hit those marks as accurately<n>as possible.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Once you get used to that distance, try<n>upping it to 1.8
meters, and then up to<n>two. This exercise should help you
hit<n>that rhythm you need.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Oh, okay! Thank you for sharing that.<n>I'll give it a try!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Mejiro Dober has a bit of a<n>complicated relationship with
men, and<n>as a result has a hard time<n>internalizing tips from
the male<n>instructors.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Air Groove was the first to notice this,<n>and took the initiative
to lend her a<n>helping hand.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Her instruction is one of the biggest<n>factors behind Mejiro
Dober's<n>success here at the academy.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: And it's not just Dober...

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: There you are, Suzuka. What are you<n>doing?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Huh? Um... Nothing, really.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I heard that the course I wanted to<n>run today is closed for
maintenance,<n>so I don't actually have anything to<n>do right
now.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
With running off the table, nothing<n>else came to mind? Heh...
how very<n>like you.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Well, I come with some good news.<n>The student council just
finished<n>looking into that maintenance. Part of<n>the course
is now available for use.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Oh! Really?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
It's almost time for curfew, but<n>knowing you, I reckon
you'd go for it<n>even if it meant only getting in a few<n>
minutes of running.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: You're right! Thank you, Air Groove!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Silence Suzuka can be a bit eccentric<n>at times, but Air
Groove has a good<n>understanding of her personality.<n>They
speak quite frequently.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
And in her role as vice president of<n>the student council, too,
she always<n>does everything in her power to<n>address this
academy's issues.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
The entire student body feels the<n>benefits of her efforts, and
of course, I<n>couldn't ask for a more reliable vice<n>president.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
So, how was that? Do you think you<n>were able to glean
some of the<n>information you were seeking?
choice_data_list: It's left me with a lot to think about.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Very good. It's wise to avoid jumping<n>to any premature
conclusions.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I was a little concerned that she might<n>cast her scepter
aside entirely, but I'm<n>glad to see my fears were<n>
unfounded.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
It's nothing. ...She has a maiden race<n>coming up soon, yes?
I wish you both<n>the best of luck.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I leave the student council office with<n>renewed resolve,
ready to consider<n>how I can truly help Air Groove to<n>
realize her goals.
